creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Konqueror(from kde2) renders some pages(jsp mostly)
from tomcat real bad.. some debug checking, this is
the response they came up with.
this is a header tomcat sent:
debug> Set-Cookie2: JSESSIONID=elkmo0ufa1;Version
   ^^^^^^^^^^^^
kde-folks>Thought we correctly parse this as well, this 
kde-folks>violates the cookie RFC, RFC 2109.

and:
debug> HTTP/1.0 200 OK
debug> Content-Type: text/html;charset=8859_1
                                      ^^^^^^^
kde-folks>Is this the charset it actually sends ? 

kde-folks>I am willing to bet on the charset!!  It is not
kde-folks> in proper >format. 


Well, are the kde folks right?
